title: Lending, Jay Powell, Oil, And EVs (Podcast)
itunes:title: Lending, Jay Powell, Oil, And EVs (Podcast)
description:
Tim Lyne, CEO at Antares Capital, joins the show to talk about outlook for the economy and lending. Tim Craighead, for Bloomberg Intelligence, joins the show to discuss the European equity landscape and outlook for economies in Europe amid inflation. Jonnelle Marte, economics and Federal Reserve reporter with Bloomberg News, joins the show to preview Jackson Hole and discuss the outlook for inflation and the economy. Fernando Valle, Senior Analyst with Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses oil prices, OPEC+ action, and the global energy markets. Sam Korus, associate portfolio manager at ARK Invest, talks about the electric vehicle space, competition, and scaling. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Kriti Gupta.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
